mapper.select: SELECT id, middle_school as middleSchool, high_school as highSchool, high_major as highMajor, university, university_major as universityMajor, graduate_school as graduateSchool, graduate_major as graduateMajor FROM degree WHERE user_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO degree (middle_school, high_school, high_major, university, university_major, graduate_school, graduate_major, user_id) VALUES (#{middleSchool}, #{highSchool}, #{highMajor}, #{university}, #{universityMajor}, #{graduateSchool}, #{graduateMajor}, #{userId});
